DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether colorectal cancer diagnosed by screening (primary screening colonoscopy, colonoscopy after FOBT) has a better pTNM classification than colorectal cancer diagnosed byl other diagnostics (diagnostic colonocopy, CT, MR etc.).
DOC.brief_title: Colorectal Cancer Study: Screening v.s. Other Diagnostics
DOC.detailed_description: Multicentre prospective observational study. 12 centres across the Czech rep. included. Study approved by Ethical Committee. Informed consent signed by every patient. Study coordinator in each centre. Patient registry availble in every centre. Patient informations stored under ID in secured internet database (RedCap) run by ICRC (The International Clinical Research Center of St. Anne's University Hospital Brno). Statistical validation of data and analysis (descriptive statistics, two-sample T-Test, Mann-Whitney test, Fisher exact test and Chi-Square test).
DOC.criteria: newly diagnosed colorectal cancer unsigned informed consent mental disorder
